remarks: Value of the group sum operation over a finite set of sequential integers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
statement:
gsumval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumval2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumval2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
gsumval2.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
gsumval2.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( M ... N ) --> B ) $.
gsumval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) ) $.
